title: IDетектив
overview: The idea of the program is simple: to restore the image of a real person using virtual traces left on the Internet by an unknown user. And if you still think that no one sees your faces online, doesn't know your age, place of work or credit history, then you absolutely need to watch the program! During the game, with the help of the presenter's tricky questions, four valiant experts refute naive misconceptions about the confidentiality of our data on the Internet.
